title: Herbal Performance Drink (Electrolyte + Ashwagandha)
excerpt: Post-workout recovery sachet combining coconut water powder, jaggery, ashwagandha extract, and rock salt to replenish electrolytes and support recovery.
content:
## What Is This Performance Drink?
A single-serve recovery drink mixing coconut water powder for electrolytes, jaggery for quick minerals and gentle carbs, ashwagandha extract for adaptogenic support, and rock salt to restore sodium balance.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Post-exertion recovery benefits from replenishment, gentle nourishment, and adaptogenic support—ashwagandha helps the body adapt while coconut-derived electrolytes restore balance.

### Key Benefits
- Replenishes electrolytes after exertion.
- Supports recovery with adaptogenic herbs.
- Convenient single-serve sachets for gym or travel.

## Ingredients
- Coconut water powder
- Jaggery (or alternative sweetener)
- Ashwagandha extract
- Rock salt

## Usage Instructions
- Mix one sachet in 300–500 ml water and sip post-workout or after heavy exertion.

## Packaging
- Single-serve sachets packaged for gym bags and travel.

## Safety & Consultation
- Those with hypertension or salt-restricted diets should consult a clinician. Monitor tolerance to adaptogens during early use.

## Why Choose This Drink?
A balanced blend of electrolytes and adaptogens to support modern training with Ayurvedic sensibility.
